article.headline: Colgate 58, Holy Cross 46
article.story: HAMILTON, N.Y. (AP) -- Kyle Roemer scored 15 points and Alex Woodhouse added 10 points and eight rebounds to lead Colgate to a 58-46 win over Holy Cross Wednesday night in Patriot League basketball. Mike Venezia added 10 points for Colgate (10-10, 2-4 PL), which snapped a four-game losing streak. Tim Clifford's 11 points and seven rebounds led Holy Cross (10-9, 1-5). Holy Cross led by as many as seven points in the first half. Colgate took its first lead, 14-12, on Woodhouse's jumper with 8:24 left, and went on to lead 23-22 at the half. In the second half, Holy Cross held a five-point lead, 31-26, before Colgate put together a nine-point run. Roemer scored the first five points in the run to tie the contest at 31-31, before Woodhouse scored on a layup and Roemer hit a jumper to put Colgate ahead for good. Holy Cross could get no closer then five points in the final five minutes, and the Raiders made six of eight free throws in the final minute to secure the victory.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
